response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just any commodity; it has a special place in my life and I believe it could bring similar significance to yours. After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to own this product at a price of $1,200,000. I understand that such an investment may require significant thought, and I am here to answer any questions or concerns you might have. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if you would like to discuss further details. I look forward to hearing from you soon.", "product_price": 1200000}
